column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Ronaldo-less Portugal beats France 1-0 ; wins Euro ' 16
#Text=Tuesday , July 12 , 2016
#Text=On Sunday , Portugal defeated France 1 – 0 and won the UEFA Euro 2016 in extra time .
#Text=Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo was benched in the 25th minute after facing injury . Éder scored the winning goal for the Portuguese .
#Text=Before the kick-off , two-time Euro winner Xavi presented the trophy .
#Text=Both Nani and Antoine Griezmann missed their shots on target early in the match .
#Text=France had better ball possession .
#Text=Ricardo Quaresma
#Text=was substituted for Ronaldo in the 25th minute after Ronaldo was injured when Dimitri Payet bumped into him and Ronaldo had to be carried out on a stretcher .
#Text=Nani wore the captain 's armband .
#Text=Gurrerio 's shot was blocked in the 38h minute .
#Text=In the second half , Paul Pogba had a good chance to score but missed in the 54th minute .
#Text=Kingsley Coman
#Text=was brought in for Payet in the 58th minute .
#Text=In the 75th minute , Olivier Giroud missed a chance to score from Coman 's assist .
#Text=Renato Sanches
#Text=was replaced by Éder in the 79th minute .
#Text=As none of the sides could score a goal , the referee called extra time .
#Text=This was the first final since 2000 to go into extra time which France won against their neighbours Italy 2 – 1 .
#Text=In the second half of extra time , Éder scored from João Moutinho ' s assist .
#Text=The hosts were trailing with just eleven minutes to play .
#Text=Though injured , Ronaldo was seen guiding the Portuguese players .
#Text=The referee 's final whistle of the tournament ignited celebration of the Portuguese supporters .
#Text=France had defeated Portugal in their last ten matches face to face .
#Text=Portuguese defender Pepe was awarded the Man of the Match .
#Text=Portugal are the tenth different country to win the Euro tournament .
#Text=Bayern Munich
#Text=signing Renato Sanches became the youngest player to play a Euro final .
#Text=He will turn 19 next month .
#Text=He won the SOCAR Young Player of the Tournament award as well .
#Text=Portuguese goalkeeper
#Text=Rui Patrício
#Text=has n't conceded a single goal in his last fourteen competitive games .
#Text=Had France won the match , Munich 's midfielder Coman would have been the youngest player to win the Euro tournament .
#Text=Antoine Griezmann won the Golden boot scoring six goals in the tournament , the all-time highest being nine goals by Michel Platini .
#Text=After the match , Griezmann said , " It 's cruel and magnificent at the same time .
